data.message: How do I block game requests?

replies.message: Hey Ernest. When you block an app or game, it won't be able to access any of your Facebook information or send you any requests. If you no longer want an app or game to contact you, please remove it: https://www.facebook.com/help/170585223002660 . For more information on blocking an app or game, please visit our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/121070141307903 . -Hailey

Yeah Mr. Facebook. I've never played Candy Crush Saga in my life but I KEEP getting invites to play from my "friends" who are apparently infatuated with that game. Can I stop their infatuations from showing up in my notifications?
I believe a lot of the 'game requests' from friends are auto-generated through FB and those friends probably don't have a clue that you're being solicited. Just my guess..
I would agree. But I won't play one of those games regardless of the number of requests.

It's advertising bulls**t -- that's how facebook gets most of their money.   But since we're loading up on basic how-to's - how about a tutorial on moving multiple photos at once, from one album to another.  You know, like it used to be before facebook decided to 'improve' by deleting useful features.  Not that I'm bitter or anything...
